data.sentence: The word أَخَذْنَا comes from the root ا خ ذ and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
data.sentence: The word بِالْعَذَابِ comes from the root ع ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.

data.meanings: soft, ease, to lead a delicate life, enjoy good things of life, to bestow the good things of life.Luxuriant/flourishing/succulent/plentifulness.Corrupted, well to do, ungrateful, proud, one whom a life of softness and ease has caused to behave insolently, one whom the exclusive pursuit of pleasures of life has corrupted.
data.sentence: The word مُتْرَفِيهِمْ comes from the root ت ر ف and is associated with the meanings: soft, ease, to lead a delicate life, enjoy good things of life, to bestow the good things of life.Luxuriant/flourishing/succulent/plentifulness.Corrupted, well to do, ungrateful, proud, one whom a life of softness and ease has caused to behave insolently, one whom the exclusive pursuit of pleasures of life has corrupted.
